amendment.description: To authorize the export of lethal military equipment to Iraq for use by a reconstituted (or interim) Iraqi military or other security forces, that support U.S. efforts in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1863 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1863 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S12660; text: CR S12660) To authorize the export of lethal military equipment to Iraq for use by a reconstituted (or interim) Iraqi military or other security forces, that support U.S. efforts in Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1863 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1863 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McConnell.
